Welcome Text: Hello ! Welcome on the main page. The site is under construction, come back later !

List1: Did you had a hobby younger ?
Do you like discover new activities ?
Do you have some fun by learning ?
Do you like practice atfer or beside work ?
Are you not affraid to meet new people ?
List2: But today you didn't find your new spark
But you don't know where to start
But you are loose under all the informations on internet
But you don't want to spent to much money on it
Adventurer.Question1: So who is better than a passionate to fit all of those ?

TimeLine1.title: The localisation
TimeLine1.text: Fill your postal code to define your search area

TimeLine1.title: Filter, Compare
TimeLine1.text: Choose tour preferences and check all the hobbies' wall around your place

TimeLine1.title: Make the first step
TimeLine1.text: One your hobby choose, send the first message to discuss

List3: You have a better idea of how this hobby works
You know where to start and by knowing someone
You only paid the bare minimum
You have a better idea if you want to get into it !

List1: Do you like to share your experience and knowledge ?
Do you lose perception of time when doing your hobby ?
Are you flexible as well as regular on your schedule ?
Do you like to meet new people around your hobby ?
List2: But sometimes you feel a bit lonely or you've done the rounds of possible meetings
But your friends get bored when you tell them about your passion
But you don't want other people to fall into the same traps as you
But it's hard to meet new people you can trust around your passion
Passionate.Question1: So who is better than a adventurer to fit all of those ?

TimeLine1.title: Express yourself
TimeLine1.text: Create your hobby's wall, write some text, put some pictures or videos to share your path with it

TimeLine1.title: Define your preferences
TimeLine1.text: Define your rhythm, your notifications and meeting's type you would like to have around your hobby

List3: You have met potential future passionate
You have shared your passion and experience to the fullest
You have new contacts and friends
And it only cost you time!

TimeLine1.title: Discuss
TimeLine1.text: Discuss around the hobby and the passionate experience by message, ask question/respond to them to discorver the other

TimeLine1.title: Virtual meeting
TimeLine1.text: If you like, you can meet virtually first on different platform

TimeLine1.title: Prepare the Experience
TimeLine1.text: The passionate can propose a Experience when he is ready and give all the information to be ready : the place, the time... The adventurer can accept or propose a modification

TimeLine1.title: Have a Great time
TimeLine1.text: Do the experience, discover the person and the hobby

TimeLine1.title: Feedback
TimeLine1.text: After the experience, give a feedback and a thank you to the other to share how cool it was
